alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Chouteau; Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 8:42PM MDT until July 30 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Judith Basin County in central Montana... West central Fergus County in central Montana... Southeastern Chouteau County in north central Montana... East central Cascade County in central Montana... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 841 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles north of Geyser, or 26 miles south of Fort Benton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geraldine, Shonkin and Square Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rainfall with this storm may lead to minor flash flooding, especially in low lying areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
